content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Mr. Wang, I'm glad we're talking about the rental price. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to your liking. Let's start with an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Let's say 650 Euro per month. This includes all necessary amenities and utilities. The apartment is in the city center, so you'll have easy access to everything you need.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price you're offering is too low for the prime location of the apartment. I'm sure you understand that a city center apartment comes with a higher price tag. Let's hear your next offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, how about 700 Euro per month? This is a great deal for such a centrally located apartment. I'm sure you'll agree that it's a fair price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because 700 Euro per month is still too low for an unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center. I'm sure you understand that the location of my apartment is prime and deserves a higher price. Let's hear your next offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, I understand your point. Let's say 725 Euro per month. This is a fair price, especially considering the proximity to all important facilities. I'm sure you'll find it reasonable.
